name: Marjorie Saiser
bio: Marjorie Saiser is the author of six poetry collections, including The Woman in the Moon (2018), Beside You at the Stoplight (2010), Road Trip (2003), and Lost in Seward County (2001). Her poetry has been published in former U.S. poet laureate Ted Kooser's column, "American Life in Poetry." She lives in Nebraska.
